docs.name: FixedMaterialTabStripComponent
docs.comment:
A tab strip component with Tab-styled buttons and active tab indicator.

This is the Fixed tab strip from the material spec which has equal sized tab buttons, and no scrolling.

Note: To achieve a quality user experience, users of the tab strip must set focus to newly revealed content so that 1) the tab does not retain the focus style, and 2) screen-readers can reckon what has changed.

outputs.name: activeTabIndexChange
outputs.comment: Stream of updates to activeTabIndex, published after the tabChange event has fired.

outputs.name: beforeTabChange
outputs.comment:
Stream of TabChangeEvent instances, published before the tab has changed.

Calling TabChangeEvent#preventDefault will prevent the tab from changing.

outputs.name: tabChange
outputs.comment: Stream of TabChangeEvent instances, published when the tab has changed.

docs.name: MaterialTabPanelComponent
docs.comment: A component that creates a tab panel with navigation bar on the top.

inputs.name: centerTabs
inputs.comment:
Whether to center-align the tab buttons.

Otherwise, buttons are aligned from the left end (LTR).

outputs.name: beforeTabChange
outputs.comment:
Stream of TabChangeEvent instances, published before the tab has changed.

Calling TabChangeEvent#preventDefault will prevent the tab from changing.

outputs.name: tabChange
outputs.comment: Stream of TabChangeEvent instances, published when the tab has changed.

docs.name: MaterialTabComponent
docs.comment:
A Material-styled card, which is shown or hidden as part of a MaterialTabPanelComponent.

The material-tab component sets the button's label text via the label property. Tab contents can be lazily instantiated by using the *deferredContent template directive.
